column3: Going to test this on my test node.\n
Looks good to me. This assert could even be left out as GetAncestor already returns NULL for heights `<0`.\n

To mimick the exact old code, it would need to be nHeightFirst = std::max(0, pindex->nHeight - (... - 1));. I added the assert to be sure for now that dropping the std::max is safe (which it should be afaict).\n
